verbs.description: [ARGM-DIS: swc] [ARG0: presidents] [V: vote] [ARG1: for merger talks with big 8 talk] of talks between the big eight and southwest conferences has been ignited again this time by renewed fears of expansion by the big ten and or pacific-10 the swc council of presidents voted thursday in dallas to invite big eight presidents to discuss a possible merger any discussion unless it on the ceo level would be very premature said big eight commissioner carl james the big eight presidents already were scheduled to meet monday and james said the issue would no doubt be discussed then in september the big ten conference discussed adding a 12th member when its self - imposed moratorium on expansion ends in 1994 colorado big east conference richard l van horn sec atlantic coast john campbell basketball oklahoma donnie duncan arkansas texas commissioner ceo abc - tv football director university of oklahoma atlantic ocean richard van horn ncaa abc tv southeastern conference nebraska missouri ou carl james swc
